narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. This pre-license inspection for a Class "B" license and exit 
briefing were conducted with the applicant. 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Applicant must submit license fee to: 
USDA APHIS Animal Care 
2150 Centre Avenue

Fort Collins, CO 80526
